long_description: The New Hammered pattern blade with its super luminous reflective flash, unique color patterns and all the traditionally proven features of Panther Martin Classic Spinners make these lures a must have for any angler's tackle box.  A hammered blade reflects light throughout the whole surface area of the blade producing a kaleidoscope of continuous lightning flashes that is hard to miss and hard for the fish to resist.  Eye Popping FishSeeUV Colors with UV Blades and Bodies.  Panther Martin Hammered Spinners have it all. Deadly on trout, panfish, bass, walleye, perch, pike, pickerel and wide range of other species.
google_categorization: Sporting Goods > Outdoor Recreation > Fishing > Fishing Lures
